description: Ready made puff pastry is a great shortcut to make delicious, quick sticky buns at home.
keywords: Bun,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Cheat's Cinnamon & Walnut Sticky Buns Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with parchment paper. Mix the walnuts, brown sugar and 1.5 tablespoons of cinnamon together in a bowl.
Unroll the pastry on a lightly floured work surface and roll out slightly with a rolling pin. Spread the walnut mix on the pastry leaving a 1cm border. Brush the border with beaten egg.
Roll the pastry up into a tight log and seal the edges with beaten egg. Slice into 12 equal discs and arrange in the baking tray. Brush all over with beaten egg.

Bake for 15-18 minutes until puffed and golden. Leave to cool slightly. Mix the icing sugar and 1/2 a teaspoon of cinnamon with 1.5-2 tablespoons of water in a small bowl. Drizzle on top of the warm buns and serve.
